EmailTemplate.name: Sales Enablement Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Enablement Customer Service Survey - {!Case.CaseNumber}: Subject {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Support_Requester__c},
You have been selected to complete a survey. To help us serve you better, please take a moment to answer the questions below.
1. Was your issued resolved?
2. How satisfied are you with the service you received regarding your issue?
(5=Outstanding 4=Excellent 3=Good 2=Fair 1=Poor)
3. Is there anything else you'd like to add?
For more details, please click the link below while logged onto the network: https://officedepot.my.salesforce.com/{!Case.Id}
Thank you, Sales Enablement Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
